# Contributing to sqlo

Thank you for your interest in contributing to `sqlo`!

For detailed instructions on setting up your development environment, running tests, and code style guidelines, please refer to our [Development Guide](DEVELOPMENT.md).

## Pull Requests

1. Fork the repository.
2. Create a new branch for your feature or fix.
3. Make your changes and add tests.
4. Ensure all tests pass and code is formatted correctly (see [Development Guide](DEVELOPMENT.md)).
5. Submit a Pull Request.

## License

By contributing, you agree that your contributions will be licensed under the MIT License.
